channel.title: Covariance Calculations
channel.description: A short document with accompanying R code that details (1) the functions used to bound parameters, (2) the method for calculating a bounded covariance matrix, and (3) what is stored in the binary admodel.hes and admodel.cov files and how the user can utilize this information to gain more control over an MCMC chain.

item.title: Covariance Calculations
item.description: A document detailing the calculations used internally for calculating the covariance matrix with bounded parameters.

item.title: R code to interact with admodel.cov
item.description: R code for reproducing the covariance calculations and manipulating the admodel.cov file.
